title: THE HAUNTING OF BLY MANOR - Hidden Ghosts, New Photos, and Plot Revealed!
author: Think Story
comment: This looks like what everyone wanted AHS to be before it went campy.
Literally can't wait...HHH is one of my favorite shows that I keep recommending
its going to be a tough task to top the child actors from the Hill House series
I love how the show always has hidden ghosts in almost every scene...
I can't wait to watch this and not be able to sleep or use the bathroom independently again lol
description:
In this video we break down the latest news for Netflix's "The Haunting of Hill House" Season 2 also known as "The Haunting of Bly Manor." New set photos, plot, and ghosts revealed!
